definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Ge 31:40 dryness, drought, heat, abs. ´[[ח]] Ge 31:40 + 11 t. + De 28:22 (for MT [[חֶרֶב]]; v. Di, sq. Vulgate; LXX and LXXL om.);—

dryness Ju Jdg 6:37, Jdg 6:39, Jdg 6:40 (all of absence of dew); Je 50:38 (‖[[יׇבֵשׁ]]); so rd. also Zec 11:17 (for MT [[חֶרֶב]], see v:b and Sta:ZAW i. 1881, 29), a drying up upon his arm (i.e. a withering) and upon his right eye.
parching heat (of sun) Ge 31:40 (opp. [[קֶ֫רַח]]), Je 36:30 (opp. id.); Is 4:6, Is 25:4, Is 25:5, Is 25:5; of fever Job 30:30.
